channel.title: Life on Long Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Long Thoughts

item.title: What do we know about who we want to be?
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: It is pretty important for each of us to be the person we want to be. For survival, for society, for integrity. What do we know then about who we want to be? We need to know a lot about who we are in order to in contrast know who we want to become. What do we know about who we want to be? We don’t know what we want.

item.title: The three most important skills to have as a young adult
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: This is a long one. Get ready for it. TL;DR: The skill to change your habits, so you could start trying new ones (better or worse than your current ones) to begin with. The skill to build the desire of trying things truely out of your comfort zone, so you could expand your horizon and thereby change more of your habits. The skill of writing, so you could articulate what it is that you want.
